				    function getQueryParams(qs) {
    			        qs = qs.split('+').join(' ');
    			        var params = {},
    			            tokens,
    			            re = /[?&]?([^=]+)=([^&]*)/g;
    			        while (tokens = re.exec(qs)) {
    			            params[decodeURIComponent(tokens[1])] = decodeURIComponent(tokens[2]);
    			        }
    			        return params;
			        }

					_cookie = {
					get : function (name) {
						var start = document.cookie.indexOf(name + "=");
						var len = start + name.length + 1;
						if (!start && name != document.cookie.substring(0, name.length))
							return null;

						if (start == -1)
							return null;
						var end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", len);
						if (end == -1)
							end = document.cookie.length;
						return unescape(document.cookie.substring(len, end));
					},

					set : function (name, value, expires, path, domain, secure) {
						var today = new Date();
						today.setTime(today.getTime());
						if (expires) {
							expires = expires * 1000; // in seconds (for days : * 60 * 60 * 24)

						}
						var expires_date = new Date(today.getTime() + (expires));
						document.cookie = name + '=' + escape(value) + ((expires) ? ';expires=' + expires_date.toGMTString() : '') + //expires.toGMTString()

								((path) ? ';path=' + path : '') + ((domain) ? ';domain=' + domain : '') + ((secure) ? ';secure' : '');
						}
					};
					var canonicalUrl = "",
						links = document.getElementsByTagName("link");
					// Getting the Canonical URL from the link attribute itself
					for (var i = 0; i < links.length; i++) {
						if (links[i].getAttribute("rel") == "canonical") {
							canonicalUrl = links[i].getAttribute("href");
							break;
						}
					}
					
					canonicalUrl = canonicalUrl.substr(canonicalUrl.indexOf(':') + 1);
					multipublishURL = multipublishURL.substr(multipublishURL.indexOf(':') + 1);
					
					if (!_cookie.get("article_" + artId) && canonicalUrl.indexOf("//economictimes.indiatimes.com") >= 0 && (canonicalUrl + location.search).split(".com")[1] != location.pathname && location.host == "economictimes.indiatimes.com" && !multipublish && !utmNewsletter) {
						_cookie.set("article_" + artId, "1", 180, "/");
						document.location.href = canonicalUrl + location.search;
					} else if (!_cookie.get("article_" + artId) && multipublishURL.indexOf("//economictimes.indiatimes.com") >= 0  && (multipublishURL + location.search).split(".com")[1] != location.pathname && location.host == "economictimes.indiatimes.com" && multipublish && !utmNewsletter) {
						_cookie.set("article_" + artId, "1", 180, "/");
						document.location.href = multipublishURL + location.search;
					}

            			            //var d = new Date(), ctime = d.getTime();
            			            localStorage.removeItem('geolocation');

                			            savedLoc = gl.location;
                			            if((curTime - gl.time) > retainFor) {loadJs();}

   <div class="clearfix relative">
    <div class="article_wrap flt">
     <script type="text/javascript" xmlns:ext="http://exslt.org/common" xmlns:g="http://base.google.com/ns/1.0" xmlns:java="java" xmlns:listval="com.indiatimes.cms.utilities.CMSDateUtility" xmlns:nohtml="com.til.utils.CommonUtils" xmlns:valurl="com.times.utilities.CMSWebUtility" xmlns:xhtml="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
      var showFullWidthArticle = '1';
     </script>
     <div class="article_block" data-agency="IANS" data-article_id="67804518" data-authors="" data-blacklist="dead,dead,died,shot,violent,jail," data-budget-keyword="0" data-keywords="Mohammad Yusuf,Mohammad Shahabuddin,Bihar,Tihar jail,Janata Dal" data-seokeywords="" data-server-sec="false" data-special_coverage="">
      <script type="text/javascript">
      </script>

         <h1 class="clearfix title">
          Shahabuddin's nephew shot dead in Bihar
         </h1>
         <h2 class="title2">
          The attackers pumped the bullets into his chest and Yusuf died on the spot," Jha said, adding it was not yet clear what led to the murder.
         </h2>

           <a class="playVideo" data-denmark="1" data-hostid="153" data-videoid="67803018">
            <img alt="Bihar: Ex-RJD MP Shahabuddin’s nephew shot dead in Siwan" border="0" src="https://img.etimg.com/thumb/msid-67803018,width-300,resizemode-4,imgsize-25228/.jpg" style="padding-right:5px;" width="300"/>
            <span class="icon-play">
            </span>

           <figcaption>
            Bihar: Ex-RJD MP Shahabuddin’s nephew shot dead in Siwan
           </figcaption>
          </figure>
          <div class="videoHolder">
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="artText">
          <div class="section1">
           <div class="Normal">
            Patna: Jailed former Rashtriya
            <a href="/topic/Janata-Dal" target="_blank">
             Janata Dal
            </a>
            MP
            <a href="/topic/Mohammad-Shahabuddin" target="_blank">
             Mohammad Shahabuddin
            </a>
            's nephew was shot dead in
            <a href="/topic/Bihar" target="_blank">
             Bihar
            </a>
            's Siwan district, triggering violent protests, police said on Saturday.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            <a href="/topic/Mohammad-Yusuf" target="_blank">
             Mohammad Yusuf
            </a>
            was shot dead in Pratappur village, where Shahabuddin hails from. He was gunned down by unidentified assailants late on Friday, Siwan Superintendent of police Navin Chander Jha said.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            The attackers pumped the bullets into his chest and Yusuf died on the spot," Jha said, adding it was not yet clear what led to the murder.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Yusuf was close to his cousin Mohammad Osama, Shahabuddin's son.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Hundread of angry villagers, mostly Shahabussin's supporters, blocked roads and demanded action.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Shahabuddin is currently lodged in
            <a href="/topic/Tihar-jail" target="_blank">
             Tihar jail
            </a>
            in Delhi.
            <br/>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="clr">
         </div>
         <div class="clr">
         </div>

           Bihar: Ex-RJD MP Shahabuddin’s nephew shot dead in Siwan
          </a>

    				    function hidePremiumContentBox(){
    			            if (typeof isContentPrintable!="undefined" && isContentPrintable == 1 && _tp_data.isLogged == true){
                                $('.article_block').removeClass('exclusive-print');
                            } else if (typeof isContentPrintable!="undefined" && isContentPrintable == 1 && _tp_data.isLogged == false){
            			        ga('send', 'event', 'SignIn Content', 'Content View', 'Viewed', 1);
                            }
    				    }
    				    
    				    $(document).ready(function(){
    				        hidePremiumContentBox();
    				    });

  </script>

				    function getQueryParams(qs) {
    			        qs = qs.split('+').join(' ');
    			        var params = {},
    			            tokens,
    			            re = /[?&]?([^=]+)=([^&]*)/g;
    			        while (tokens = re.exec(qs)) {
    			            params[decodeURIComponent(tokens[1])] = decodeURIComponent(tokens[2]);
    			        }
    			        return params;
			        }
			        var query = getQueryParams(document.location.search);

                                        })();

					{document.domain = hdomain}}

					/* ========== Article redirection to actual URL ============ */
					
					_cookie = {
					get : function (name) {
						var start = document.cookie.indexOf(name + "=");
						var len = start + name.length + 1;
						if (!start && name != document.cookie.substring(0, name.length))
							return null;

						if (start == -1)
							return null;
						var end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", len);
						if (end == -1)
							end = document.cookie.length;
						return unescape(document.cookie.substring(len, end));
					},

					set : function (name, value, expires, path, domain, secure) {
						var today = new Date();
						today.setTime(today.getTime());
						if (expires) {
							expires = expires * 1000; // in seconds (for days : * 60 * 60 * 24)

						}
						var expires_date = new Date(today.getTime() + (expires));
						document.cookie = name + '=' + escape(value) + ((expires) ? ';expires=' + expires_date.toGMTString() : '') + //expires.toGMTString()

								((path) ? ';path=' + path : '') + ((domain) ? ';domain=' + domain : '') + ((secure) ? ';secure' : '');
						}
					};
					var canonicalUrl = "",
						links = document.getElementsByTagName("link");
					// Getting the Canonical URL from the link attribute itself
					for (var i = 0; i < links.length; i++) {
						if (links[i].getAttribute("rel") == "canonical") {
							canonicalUrl = links[i].getAttribute("href");
							break;
						}
					}
					
					canonicalUrl = canonicalUrl.substr(canonicalUrl.indexOf(':') + 1);
					multipublishURL = multipublishURL.substr(multipublishURL.indexOf(':') + 1);
					
					if (!_cookie.get("article_" + artId) && canonicalUrl.indexOf("//economictimes.indiatimes.com") >= 0 && (canonicalUrl + location.search).split(".com")[1] != location.pathname && location.host == "economictimes.indiatimes.com" && !multipublish && !utmNewsletter) {
						_cookie.set("article_" + artId, "1", 180, "/");
						document.location.href = canonicalUrl + location.search;
					} else if (!_cookie.get("article_" + artId) && multipublishURL.indexOf("//economictimes.indiatimes.com") >= 0  && (multipublishURL + location.search).split(".com")[1] != location.pathname && location.host == "economictimes.indiatimes.com" && multipublish && !utmNewsletter) {
						_cookie.set("article_" + artId, "1", 180, "/");
						document.location.href = multipublishURL + location.search;
					}

            		    geolocation = (function () {
            		        var savedLoc = '';
            		        try {
            			        var loadJs = function () {
            			            //var d = new Date(), ctime = d.getTime();
            			            localStorage.removeItem('geolocation');
            			            var script = document.createElement('script');script.async = false; script.type = "text/javascript";script.src = '//economictimes.indiatimes.com/geotargetgroup.cms';

            			            var gl = localStorage.getItem('geolocation');gl = gl ? JSON.parse(gl) : '';
            			            if(gl) {
                			            var curTime = new Date().getTime();var retainFor = 60 * 60 * 1000; // 1 hr
                			            savedLoc = gl.location;
                			            if((curTime - gl.time) > retainFor) {loadJs();}
            			            } else {loadJs();}
            			        } else {loadJs();}
            			    } catch (e) {}
            			    return savedLoc;
            		    })();

        <article data-articleid="68161675" data-artidate="Feb 26, 2019, 08.10 AM IST" data-ibeat_author="Sanjay Singh" data-ibeat_channel="ET Bureau" data-ibeat_tag="Rahul Gandhi,Bihar,Rashtriya Janata Dal,Rashtriya Lok Samta Party,lok sabha,">
         <input id="article_title" type="hidden" value="Bihar’s opposition alliance looks for suitable seat-sharing formula"/>
         <input id="article_syn" type="hidden" value="Meanwhile, there is still confusion over seat allocation among the left parties."/>
         <input id="article_seo" type="hidden" value="news/elections/lok-sabha/bihar/bihars-opposition-alliance-looks-for-suitable-seat-sharing-formula"/>
         <h1 class="clearfix title">
          Bihar’s opposition alliance looks for suitable seat-sharing formula
         </h1>
         <h2 class="title2">
          Meanwhile, there is still confusion over seat allocation among the left parties.
         </h2>
         <div class="clearfix publish_info">
          <div class="publisher flt">
           <div class="author">
            By
            <div class="split">
             <div class="a_d">
              <span>
               <a class="italic" data-agency="" data-auname="Sanjay Singh-6926" data-seo="Sanjay Singh" href="/etreporter/author-Sanjay Singh-6926.cms" rel="author" target="_blank">
                Sanjay Singh
               </a>
              </span>
              <div class="author_box">
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           , ET Bureau
           <span class="msides5">
            |
           </span>
          </div>
          <div class="publish_on flt">
           Updated: Feb 26, 2019, 08.12 AM IST
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="clearfix sharingBox shareVert" data-share_msid="68161675">
          <a class="fb shareSprite" data-share-title="Bihar's opposition alliance looks for suitable seat-sharing formula" data-share-url="http://www.ecoti.in/4Zyytb98" data-src="http://www.ecoti.in/4Zyytb98" href="javascript://" onclick='ga("send", {hitType: "social", socialNetwork: "Facebook", socialAction: "Share", socialTarget: "https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/elections/lok-sabha/bihar/bihars-opposition-alliance-looks-for-suitable-seat-sharing-formula/articleshow/68161675.cms", page: "/news/elections/lok-sabha/bihar/bihars-opposition-alliance-looks-for-suitable-seat-sharing-formula/articleshow/68161675.cms"})' rel="nofollow">
          </a>
          <a class="twt shareSprite" data-share-title="Bihar's opposition alliance looks for suitable seat-sharing formula" data-share-url="http://www.ecoti.in/N_oqka35" data-src="http://www.ecoti.in/N_oqka35" href="javascript://" onclick='ga("send", {hitType: "social", socialNetwork: "Twitter", socialAction: "Tweet", socialTarget: "https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/elections/lok-sabha/bihar/bihars-opposition-alliance-looks-for-suitable-seat-sharing-formula/articleshow/68161675.cms", page: "/news/elections/lok-sabha/bihar/bihars-opposition-alliance-looks-for-suitable-seat-sharing-formula/articleshow/68161675.cms"})' rel="nofollow">
          </a>
          <a class="in shareSprite" data-share-title="Bihar's opposition alliance looks for suitable seat-sharing formula" data-share-url="http://www.ecoti.in/93ub_b" data-src="http://www.ecoti.in/93ub_b" href="javascript://" onclick='ga("send", {hitType: "social", socialNetwork: "LinkedIn", socialAction: "Share", socialTarget: "https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/elections/lok-sabha/bihar/bihars-opposition-alliance-looks-for-suitable-seat-sharing-formula/articleshow/68161675.cms", page: "/news/elections/lok-sabha/bihar/bihars-opposition-alliance-looks-for-suitable-seat-sharing-formula/articleshow/68161675.cms"})' rel="nofollow">
          </a>
          <a class="wa shareSprite" data-share-title="Bihar's opposition alliance looks for suitable seat-sharing formula" data-share-url="http://www.ecoti.in/KfXvib92" data-src="http://www.ecoti.in/KfXvib92" data-watext="Hey, This might interest you! %0A%0A" href="javascript://" onclick='ga("send", {hitType: "social", socialNetwork: "Whatsapp", socialAction: "Share", socialTarget: "https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/elections/lok-sabha/bihar/bihars-opposition-alliance-looks-for-suitable-seat-sharing-formula/articleshow/68161675.cms", page: "/news/elections/lok-sabha/bihar/bihars-opposition-alliance-looks-for-suitable-seat-sharing-formula/articleshow/68161675.cms"})' rel="nofollow">
          </a>
          <a class="shareSprite shareMore" href="javascript:void(0)" title="Share more">
          </a>
          <a class="shareSprite cmt-gdpr-hide cmt" data-commentbox_msid="68161675" href="javascript:void(0)" id="commentCountBtn" onclick="commentBox.show(68161675);" title="Comments">
          </a>
          <div class="flt comment_count cmt-gdpr-hide" data-msid="68161675" onclick="commentBox.show(68161675);">
           <span>
            0
           </span>
           Comments
          </div>
          <div class="flr page_options">
           <a class="asSprite fontLarge fontSize" href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="etArt.fontSizeclick(this);" title="Increase/Decrease font size">
           </a>
           <a class="asSprite print" href="/news/elections/lok-sabha/bihar/bihars-opposition-alliance-looks-for-suitable-seat-sharing-formula/printarticle/68161675.cms" target="_blank" title="Print this article">
           </a>
           <a class="asSprite email" href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="emailSend.init();" title="Email this article">
           </a>
           <a class="bookmark-icon" data-arttype="0" data-msid="68161675" href="javascript://" title="Bookmark this article">
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="articleImg midImg">
          <figure>
           <img alt="7" border="0" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0" src="https://img.etimg.com/thumb/msid-68161731,width-300,imgsize-30160,resizemode-4/7.jpg" vspace="0" width="300"/>
           <figcaption>
            Sources said CPI (ML), which had fielded its candidates on 23 seats in the 2014 LS election, also wants a good share of seats in GA.
           </figcaption>
          </figure>
         </div>
         <div class="artText">
          <div class="section1">
           <div class="Normal">
            Patna: Even as the Congress-Rashtriya Janata Dal (RJD) logjam continues over seat allocation in
            <a href="/topic/Bihar" target="_blank">
             Bihar
            </a>
            , some of the smaller partners in the opposition grand alliance have started asserting their position, making it even more difficult to reach a consensus on seat sharing for the upcoming
            <a href="/topic/Lok-Sabha" target="_blank">
             Lok Sabha
            </a>
            elections.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Besides RJD and Congress, the grand alliance (GA) in Bihar comprises Rashtriya Lok Samata Party (RLSP), Vikassheel Insan Party (VIP), Hindustani Awam Morcha (HAM) and the left parties. While all eyes are on the outcome of the recent talks between RJD leader Tejashwi Prasad Yadav and Congress president
            <a href="/topic/Rahul-Gandhi" target="_blank">
             Rahul Gandhi
            </a>
            , former Bihar chief minister Jitan Ram Manjhi has reportedly demanded that his party be given seats on a par with RLSP, which is led by former union minister Upendra Kushwaha.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Meanwhile, there is still confusion over seat allocation among the left parties. While CPI has demanded at least three seats, CPM is vying for the Ujiarpur seat, which is represented by BJP’s state unit president Nityanand Rai in the current in Lok Sabha. “Our leader D Raja, who recently met RJD chief Lalu Prasad at RIMS, Ranchi, has already communicated CPI’s demand,” CPI state secretary Satyanarayan Singh told ET on phone. CPI has support base in areas like Begusarai, Madhubani, Motihari and Khagaria. Sources said CPI is looking for at least three seats to contest as its share in the GA.
            <br/>
            <figure class="midImg" data-align="" data-msid="68161808">
             <img alt="8" src="/img/68161808/Master.jpg" title="8"/>
             <figcaption>
             </figcaption>
            </figure>
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Sources said CPI (ML), which had fielded its candidates on 23 seats in the 2014 LS election, also wants a good share of seats in GA. It is already preparing to contest from six seats—Ara, Siwan, Jahanabad, Karakat, Patliputra and Valmikinagar. “We are in touch with senior leaders of RJD to negotiate seats for our party in GA,” CPI (ML) secretary Kunal told ET.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            The Darbangha seat is also set to become a conflict point between GA partners with former BJP MP Kirti Azad joining Congress. Azad, who was elected to Lok Sabha on a BJP ticket from Darbhanga in 2014, wants to contest from the same seat as a Congress nominee. And so does VIP leader Mukesh Shahni. VIP was accommodated in the GA by RJD. “If Kirti Azad contests as Congress party’s nominee from Darbhanga seat, RJD is supposed to spare a suitable seat for VIP in GA,” a source in RJD said.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Moreover, Madhepura MP Pappu Yadav is reportedly looking to become a part of GA in Bihar. but Congress has not taken any decision so far on Yadav’s entry. “RJD does not want Pappu to become a part of GA. So, it will be a difficult decision for Congress to accommodate Pappu,” a source in RJD said.
            <br/>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="clr">
         </div>
         <div class="clr">
         </div>

          <script id="simple-list-menu-tmpl" type="text/x-jsrender">
           <ul>
                {{for items}}
                <li data-id="{{:catkey}}">
                    <a href="{{:link}}">
                        {{:section}}
                    </a>   
                </li>
                {{/for}}
            </ul>
          </script>
          <script id="multi-list-menu-tmpl" type="text/x-jsrender">
           {{for lists}}
                <h4 class="list-title">{{:title}}</h4>
                <ul>
                    {{for items}}
                        <li data-id="{{:catkey}}">
                            <a href="{{:link}}">
                                {{:section}}
                            </a>
                        </li>
                    {{/for}}
                </ul>
            {{/for}}
          </script>
          <script id="two-column-menu-tmpl" type="text/x-jsrender">
           {{if items.length}}
                <ul {{if items[activeIndex].className}}class="gallery {{:items[activeIndex].className}}"{{/if}} {{if items[activeIndex].catkey == 'gadgets'}}class="links-list"{{/if}}>
                    {{for items[activeIndex].stories ~class=items[activeIndex].className ~domain=items[activeIndex].domain}}
                        <li {{if !imageurl}}class="no-img"{{/if}}>
                            <a href="{{if ~domain}}{{:~domain}}{{/if}}{{:link}}" title="{{:title}}>
                                {{if ((#index === 0) || (~class === 'videos') || (~class === 'photos'))}}
                                <img data-src="{{:imageurl}}" src="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/34824568.cms" alt="{{:title}}" />
                                {{/if}}
                                {{if !~class}}
                                    <span>{{:trimmedtitle}}</span>
                                {{/if}}
                            </a>   
                            {{if ~class}}
                                <a href="{{if ~domain}}{{:~domain}}{{/if}}{{:link}}">{{:title}}</a>
                            {{/if}}
                        </li>
                    {{/for}}
                </ul>
            {{/if}}
          </script>
          <script id="top-stories-menu-tmpl" type="text/x-jsrender">
           <ul {{if className}}class="gallery {{:className}}"{{/if}} {{if catkey == 'gadgets'}}class="links-list"{{/if}}>
                {{for stories ~class=className ~domain=domain}}
                    <li {{if !imageurl}}class="no-img"{{/if}}>
                        <a href="{{if ~domain}}{{:~domain}}{{/if}}{{:link}}" title="{{:title}}" pg="{{:pg}}">
                            {{if (imageurl) && ((#index === 0) || (~class === 'videos') || (~class === 'photos'))}}
                                <img data-src="{{:imageurl}}" src="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/34824568.cms" alt="{{:title}}" pg="{{:pg}}"/>
                            {{/if}}
                            {{if !~class}}
                                <span>
                                    {{if (trimmedtitle)}}
                                        <span>{{:trimmedtitle}}</span>
                                    {{else}}
                                        <span>{{:title}}</span>
                                    {{/if}}
                                </span>
                            {{/if}}
                            
                        </a>   
                        {{if ~class}}
                            <a href="{{if ~domain}}{{:~domain}}{{/if}}{{:link}}" pg="{{:pg}}">
                                {{if (trimmedtitle)}}
                                    <span>{{:trimmedtitle}}</span>
                                {{else}}
                                    <span>{{:title}}</span>
                                {{/if}}
                            </a>
                        {{/if}}
                    </li>
                {{/for}}
            </ul>
          </script>
          <script id="external-html-menu-tmpl" type="text/x-jsrender">
           {{{html}}}
          </script>

         function registerSponsorVid(){
                    window.console && console.log("*** registerSponsorVid");
                        setTimeout(function(){
                            $(document).trigger('MINI_TV_REGISTER', [{source:'sponsorVid'}, 'MINI_TV_LOADED', function(){}]);
                            $(document).trigger('MINI_TV_EVENTS', [{source: "sponsorVid",id:''}, "VIDEOREADY"]);
                        }, 100);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                            $(document).trigger('MINI_TV_EVENTS', [{source: "sponsorVid",id:''}, "PLAYING"]);
                        }, 300);
                }
			    var isMobileDevice = function () {
                    return (function (a) {
                        return /(android|bb\d+|meego).+mobile|avantgo|bada\/|blackberry|blazer|compal|elaine|fennec|hiptop|iemobile|ip(hone|od)|iris|kindle|lge |maemo|midp|mmp|mobile.+firefox|netfront|opera m(ob|in)i|palm( os)?|phone|p(ixi|re)\/|plucker|pocket|psp|series(4|6)0|symbian|treo|up\.(browser|link)|vodafone|wap|windows (ce|phone)|xda|xiino/i.test(a) || /1207|6310|6590|3gso|4thp|50[1-6]i|770s|802s|a wa|abac|ac(er|oo|s\-)|ai(ko|rn)|al(av|ca|co)|amoi|an(ex|ny|yw)|aptu|ar(ch|go)|as(te|us)|attw|au(di|\-m|r |s )|avan|be(ck|ll|nq)|bi(lb|rd)|bl(ac|az)|br(e|v)w|bumb|bw\-(n|u)|c55\/|capi|ccwa|cdm\-|cell|chtm|cldc|cmd\-|co(mp|nd)|craw|da(it|ll|ng)|dbte|dc\-s|devi|dica|dmob|do(c|p)o|ds(12|\-d)|el(49|ai)|em(l2|ul)|er(ic|k0)|esl8|ez([4-7]0|os|wa|ze)|fetc|fly(\-|_)|g1 u|g560|gene|gf\-5|g\-mo|go(\.w|od)|gr(ad|un)|haie|hcit|hd\-(m|p|t)|hei\-|hi(pt|ta)|hp( i|ip)|hs\-c|ht(c(\-| |_|a|g|p|s|t)|tp)|hu(aw|tc)|i\-(20|go|ma)|i230|iac( |\-|\/)|ibro|idea|ig01|ikom|im1k|inno|ipaq|iris|ja(t|v)a|jbro|jemu|jigs|kddi|keji|kgt( |\/)|klon|kpt |kwc\-|kyo(c|k)|le(no|xi)|lg( g|\/(k|l|u)|50|54|\-[a-w])|libw|lynx|m1\-w|m3ga|m50\/|ma(te|ui|xo)|mc(01|21|ca)|m\-cr|me(rc|ri)|mi(o8|oa|ts)|mmef|mo(01|02|bi|de|do|t(\-| |o|v)|zz)|mt(50|p1|v )|mwbp|mywa|n10[0-2]|n20[2-3]|n30(0|2)|n50(0|2|5)|n7(0(0|1)|10)|ne((c|m)\-|on|tf|wf|wg|wt)|nok(6|i)|nzph|o2im|op(ti|wv)|oran|owg1|p800|pan(a|d|t)|pdxg|pg(13|\-([1-8]|c))|phil|pire|pl(ay|uc)|pn\-2|po(ck|rt|se)|prox|psio|pt\-g|qa\-a|qc(07|12|21|32|60|\-[2-7]|i\-)|qtek|r380|r600|raks|rim9|ro(ve|zo)|s55\/|sa(ge|ma|mm|ms|ny|va)|sc(01|h\-|oo|p\-)|sdk\/|se(c(\-|0|1)|47|mc|nd|ri)|sgh\-|shar|sie(\-|m)|sk\-0|sl(45|id)|sm(al|ar|b3|it|t5)|so(ft|ny)|sp(01|h\-|v\-|v )|sy(01|mb)|t2(18|50)|t6(00|10|18)|ta(gt|lk)|tcl\-|tdg\-|tel(i|m)|tim\-|t\-mo|to(pl|sh)|ts(70|m\-|m3|m5)|tx\-9|up(\.b|g1|si)|utst|v400|v750|veri|vi(rg|te)|vk(40|5[0-3]|\-v)|vm40|voda|vulc|vx(52|53|60|61|70|80|81|83|85|98)|w3c(\-| )|webc|whit|wi(g |nc|nw)|wmlb|wonu|x700|yas\-|your|zeto|zte\-/i.test(a.substr(0, 4));
                    })(navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera);
                }
                var isTablet = function () {
            		return( function ( agent ) {
            			return /(?:ipad|tab)/i.test( agent );
            		} )( navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera );
            	}
				var miniTV = Object();
				miniTV.ajax = function(url,callback){
					$.get( url, function( data ) {
						callback( data );
					}); 
				};
				miniTV.hideMiniTvAndLabel = function(){
				    $('.livetv_box_label').hide();
                    $('.livetv_box').hide();
				};
				miniTV.isOn = function(){
				    if(isMobileDevice() || isTablet() || window.frmapp) {
				        return;
				    }
				    
				    
				    var url='https://toibnews.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/TOIBNews/home_topcontent_banner.htm';
				    if(window.location.host.match(/toidev|jcmsdev/)){
				        url='/home_topcontent_banner.cms?pagetype=isEnabled';
				    }
				    
				
				    
					miniTV.ajax(url,function(data){
						data = $.trim(data);
						var geoinfo = window.geoinfo;
            	        var countryCode = ( geoinfo.CountryCode || "" ).toUpperCase();
            	        var specialId_forGeoEvent =  ( $("#specialId_forGeoEvent").val() || "" ).toUpperCase();
            	        var matchId = $("#matchId").val() || "";
            	        if(
            	            specialId_forGeoEvent
            	            && countryCode != specialId_forGeoEvent
            	        ){
            	            miniTV.hideMiniTvAndLabel();
                            return;
            	        }else if( countryCode == 'HK' ){
            	            miniTV.hideMiniTvAndLabel();
            	            return;
            	        }
            	        
						if(toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') && data!=''){
	                        
							$('#minitv').html(data);
							
							if($('#streaming_box').is(":visible") && $('.livetv_box_label').is(":visible") || $('.livetv_box').is(":visible"))
	                        {
	                            $('.livetv_box_label').hide();
	                            $('.livetv_box').hide();
	                       }
	                       
						    if (typeof miniTV.clickLoad == "function") miniTV.clickLoad();
						} else if (data!=''){
						
							$('#minitv').html(data);
							
						    if($('#streaming_box').is(":visible") && $('.livetv_box_label').is(":visible") || $('.livetv_box').is(":visible"))
	                        {
	                            $('.livetv_box_label').hide();
	                            $('.livetv_box').hide();
	                       }
						}
						
						    
        				   if(miniTVType == "sponsoredvideo" && (miniTVScope == "etimes" && ((window.parent.toiprops.subsec1!=undefined && entertainmentSections.indexOf(window.parent.toiprops.subsec1) >=0) || (window.parent.channelname != undefined && window.parent.channelname == 233446897))) && countryCode=="IN")
        				   {
        				         if(toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') == undefined || (toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') && toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') != 1))
        				        {
        				        	$(".liveS_container").hide();
        				            if (typeof miniTV.clickLoad == "function") miniTV.clickLoad();
        				        }
        				        $("#player").attr("src", "/sponsortv.cms");
        				        $(".livetv_title").html(sponsoredTitle);
        				        $(".livetv_title").attr("title",sponsoredTitleFull);
        				        $("#streaming_box").addClass("sponsoredad");
        				        isSponsorVideoPlaying = true;
        				        registerSponsorVid && registerSponsorVid();
        				        
        				   }
        				   else if(miniTVType == "sponsoredvideo" && miniTVScope == "" && countryCode=="IN")
        				   {
        				        if(toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') == undefined || (toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') && toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') != 1))
        				        {
        				        	$(".liveS_container").hide();
        				            if (typeof miniTV.clickLoad == "function") miniTV.clickLoad();
        				        }
        				         $("#player").attr("src", "/sponsortv.cms");
        				         $(".livetv_title").html(sponsoredTitle);
        				         $(".livetv_title").attr("title",sponsoredTitleFull);
        				         $("#streaming_box").addClass("sponsoredad");
        				         isSponsorVideoPlaying = true;
        				         registerSponsorVid && registerSponsorVid();
        				   }
        				   else
        				   {
        				        $("#streaming_box").removeClass("sponsoredad");
        				        isSponsorVideoPlaying = false;
        				        // do nothing
        				        if(miniTVTitle == "")
        				        {
        				        
        				            if(toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') == undefined || (toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') && toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') != 1))
            				        {
            				        	$(".liveS_container").hide();
            				        }
        				        }
        				       
        				   }
					});
				};
			
			
			        setTimeout(function(){miniTV.isOn();}, 5000);
        </script>

       <div class="main-content">
        <section class="title_section clearfix">
         <h1 class="heading1" data-articletitle="" data-keywords="India, India news, India news today, Today news, Google news, Breaking news, West Champaran district,Siwan district,Saran district,Nawada,manoj kumar,Khagaria" style="">
          <arttitle>
           Bihar government transfers 17 IAS officials, two given additional charge
          </arttitle>
         </h1>
         <meta content="Bihar government transfers 17 IAS officials, two given additional charge" itemprop="headline"/>
         <div class="brandwire_txt">
         </div>
         <span itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/Person">
          <a class="auth_detail" href="/toireporter/author-Debashish-Karmakar-479250994.cms" rel="author" target="_blank">
           Debashish Karmakar
          </a>
          <meta content="Debashish Karmakar" itemprop="name"/>
         </span>
         <div class="artsyn" style="display:none;">
         </div>
         <span class="time_cptn">
          |
          <span>
           <span>
            TNN
           </span>
          </span>
          |
          <span>
           Feb 19, 2019, 18:35 IST
           <time datetime="2019-02-19T18:35:52+05:30">
           </time>
           <meta content="2019-02-19T18:35:52+05:30"/>
          </span>
         </span>
         <div class="leftsocial">
          <div data-tpwidget="widget-two" id="widget-two">
          </div>
          <div class="toiwidgets_social">
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="topsocial actions">
          <div class="toiwidgets_social">
          </div>

        <div data-adsslot="TOI/TOI_India/TOI_ROS_TOP_IND_AS_660" data-size="[660,90]" id="div-gpt-ad-1994947675375-0-68066119" style="margin-bottom:10px;">
        </div>
        <div class="article_content clearfix">
         <arttextxml>
          <div class="section1">
           <div class="Normal">
            PATNA: The state government on late Monday night transferred 17 IAS official while two IAS officials were given additional charge. Bhagalpur, Koshi, Purnia, Saran and Tirhut divisions got new commissioners in the reshuffling.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Bihar Human Rights Commission (BHRC) secretary Vandana Kini was appointed as new divisional commissioner of Bhagalpur replacing Rajesh Kumar who went in place of Kini in BHRC. Kumar would also hold additional charge of inquiry commissioner in General Administration Department (GAD).
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Koshi divisional commissioner Safina AN was made Purnia divisional commissioner. Till now, she was holding the additional charge of the post. Saran divisional commissioner Narmadeshwar Lal was made Tirhut divisional commissioner of which he was holding an additional charge.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Lokesh Kumar Singh replaced Lal in Saran. Till now, he was posted as executive director in state health society and was also handling additional charge of health department secretary.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Asangba Chuba Ao was appointed as new Koshi divisional commissioner. Till now, he was posted as secretary-cum-mines commissioner of mines and geology department. He was also holding additional charge of director in mines and geology department and also in Bihar State Mineral Development Corporation Limited.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Deputy development commissioner (DDC)-cum-chief executive officer (CEO) of district board, Rohtas, Udita Sigh was made joint secretary in GAD while Chhapra DDC-cum-CEO of district board Roshan Kushwaha was made DDC-cum-CEO of district board in Vaishali. Patna sadar SDO Suharsh Bhagat replaced Kushwaha in Chhapra.
            <div class="last8brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            <div class="last7brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            Baisi (Purnia) SDO Sawan Kumar was appointed as DDC-cum-district board CEO of
            <a class="key_underline" href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/topic/Nawada">
             Nawada
            </a>
            . Arara sadar SDO Praashant Kumar CH was also appointed as DDC-cum-district board CEO of Munger.
            <a class="key_underline" href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/topic/Khagaria">
             Khagaria
            </a>
            sadar SDO Manesh Kumar Meena was made DDC-cum-district board CEO of Jehanabad.
            <div class="last6brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            <div class="last5brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            Siwan sadar SDO Aman Sameer was appointed as DDC-cum-district board CEO of Purnia while Bagaha (West Champaran) SDO Ghanshyam Meena was made DDC-cum-district board CEO of Aurangabad. Shahpur Patori (Samastipur) SDO Vijay Prakash Meena was made new SDO of Bagaha.
            <div class="last4brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            <div class="last3brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            Barh (Patna) SDO Sajjan R was appointed as DDC-cum-district board CEO of Gopalganj while J Priyadarshani was posted as DDC-cum-district board CEO of Begusarai. She was earlier posted as SDO of western Muzaffarpur.
            <div class="last2brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            <div class="last1brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            Department of science and technology principal secretary Harjot Kaur Bamhrah would hold additional charge of secretary-cum-mines commissioner of mines and geology department while health department secretary
            <a class="key_underline" href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/topic/Manoj-Kumar">
             Manoj Kumar
            </a>
            would hold additional charge of executive director of state health society.
            <br/>
           </div>
          </div>
         </arttextxml>

        <div class="fORtFtreWa LgZGpQDw dGOxSnwSIgx ">

            {{if comment.length > 500}}
                <p class="detail_comment" style="display:none;">{{:comment}}</p>
            {{/if}}
            <!-- Footbar -->
            {{if id!=-1}}
            <!-- <span data-action="toggle_replies" data-togglereplies="show" title="Toggle Replies"></span>-->
            <div class="footbar clearfix">
                <span data-action="comment-reply" class="cpointer">Reply</span>

                    <span class="divider">•</span>
                {{/if}}

  <script>
   function isMobile(){
                return( function ( a ) {

           <ul>
                {{for items}}
                <li data-id="{{:catkey}}">
                    <a href="{{:link}}">
                        {{:section}}
                    </a>   
                </li>
                {{/for}}
            </ul>
          </script>
          <script id="multi-list-menu-tmpl" type="text/x-jsrender">
           {{for lists}}
                <h4 class="list-title">{{:title}}</h4>
                <ul>
                    {{for items}}
                        <li data-id="{{:catkey}}">
                            <a href="{{:link}}">
                                {{:section}}
                            </a>
                        </li>
                    {{/for}}
                </ul>
            {{/for}}
          </script>
          <script id="two-column-menu-tmpl" type="text/x-jsrender">
           {{if items.length}}
                <ul {{if items[activeIndex].className}}class="gallery {{:items[activeIndex].className}}"{{/if}} {{if items[activeIndex].catkey == 'gadgets'}}class="links-list"{{/if}}>
                    {{for items[activeIndex].stories ~class=items[activeIndex].className ~domain=items[activeIndex].domain}}
                        <li {{if !imageurl}}class="no-img"{{/if}}>
                            <a href="{{if ~domain}}{{:~domain}}{{/if}}{{:link}}" title="{{:title}}>
                                {{if ((#index === 0) || (~class === 'videos') || (~class === 'photos'))}}
                                <img data-src="{{:imageurl}}" src="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/34824568.cms" alt="{{:title}}" />
                                {{/if}}
                                {{if !~class}}
                                    <span>{{:trimmedtitle}}</span>
                                {{/if}}
                            </a>   
                            {{if ~class}}
                                <a href="{{if ~domain}}{{:~domain}}{{/if}}{{:link}}">{{:title}}</a>
                            {{/if}}
                        </li>
                    {{/for}}
                </ul>
            {{/if}}
          </script>
          <script id="top-stories-menu-tmpl" type="text/x-jsrender">
           <ul {{if className}}class="gallery {{:className}}"{{/if}} {{if catkey == 'gadgets'}}class="links-list"{{/if}}>
                {{for stories ~class=className ~domain=domain}}
                    <li {{if !imageurl}}class="no-img"{{/if}}>
                        <a href="{{if ~domain}}{{:~domain}}{{/if}}{{:link}}" title="{{:title}}" pg="{{:pg}}">
                            {{if (imageurl) && ((#index === 0) || (~class === 'videos') || (~class === 'photos'))}}
                                <img data-src="{{:imageurl}}" src="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/34824568.cms" alt="{{:title}}" pg="{{:pg}}"/>
                            {{/if}}
                            {{if !~class}}
                                <span>
                                    {{if (trimmedtitle)}}
                                        <span>{{:trimmedtitle}}</span>
                                    {{else}}
                                        <span>{{:title}}</span>
                                    {{/if}}
                                </span>
                            {{/if}}
                            
                        </a>   
                        {{if ~class}}
                            <a href="{{if ~domain}}{{:~domain}}{{/if}}{{:link}}" pg="{{:pg}}">
                                {{if (trimmedtitle)}}
                                    <span>{{:trimmedtitle}}</span>
                                {{else}}
                                    <span>{{:title}}</span>
                                {{/if}}
                            </a>
                        {{/if}}
                    </li>
                {{/for}}
            </ul>
          </script>

           {{{html}}}
          </script>

         var miniTVType = '';

		    var miniTVTitle = "";
		    var sponsoredTitleFull = '';
		    sponsoredTitle = sponsoredTitle.substring(0,77)+"...";

		    var isSponsorVideoPlaying = false;
        </script>
        <script>
         window.top.adsCallback = function(adtype){
                 if(typeof adtype!='undefined' && adtype =="sponsorVid"){
                   // $(document.getElementById("minitv")).find(".close_v").click();
                    $(document.getElementById("player")).attr("src", "/sponsortv.cms");
                 }
                     if(typeof adtype!='undefined' && adtype =="gutter"){
             setTimeout(function(){if(typeof redraw_graphs_pollution === 'function'){redraw_graphs_pollution();}},1000);
             }
             }
        </script>
        <input id="specialId_forGeoEvent" type="hidden" value=""/>
        <input id="matchId" type="hidden" value=""/>
        <div id="minitv">
        </div>
        <script src="https://geoapi.indiatimes.com/?cb=1" type="text/javascript">
        </script>
        <script>
         function registerSponsorVid(){
                    window.console && console.log("*** registerSponsorVid");
                        setTimeout(function(){
                            $(document).trigger('MINI_TV_REGISTER', [{source:'sponsorVid'}, 'MINI_TV_LOADED', function(){}]);
                            $(document).trigger('MINI_TV_EVENTS', [{source: "sponsorVid",id:''}, "VIDEOREADY"]);
                        }, 100);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                            $(document).trigger('MINI_TV_EVENTS', [{source: "sponsorVid",id:''}, "PLAYING"]);
                        }, 300);
                }
			    var isMobileDevice = function () {
                    return (function (a) {
                        return /(android|bb\d+|meego).+mobile|avantgo|bada\/|blackberry|blazer|compal|elaine|fennec|hiptop|iemobile|ip(hone|od)|iris|kindle|lge |maemo|midp|mmp|mobile.+firefox|netfront|opera m(ob|in)i|palm( os)?|phone|p(ixi|re)\/|plucker|pocket|psp|series(4|6)0|symbian|treo|up\.(browser|link)|vodafone|wap|windows (ce|phone)|xda|xiino/i.test(a) || /1207|6310|6590|3gso|4thp|50[1-6]i|770s|802s|a wa|abac|ac(er|oo|s\-)|ai(ko|rn)|al(av|ca|co)|amoi|an(ex|ny|yw)|aptu|ar(ch|go)|as(te|us)|attw|au(di|\-m|r |s )|avan|be(ck|ll|nq)|bi(lb|rd)|bl(ac|az)|br(e|v)w|bumb|bw\-(n|u)|c55\/|capi|ccwa|cdm\-|cell|chtm|cldc|cmd\-|co(mp|nd)|craw|da(it|ll|ng)|dbte|dc\-s|devi|dica|dmob|do(c|p)o|ds(12|\-d)|el(49|ai)|em(l2|ul)|er(ic|k0)|esl8|ez([4-7]0|os|wa|ze)|fetc|fly(\-|_)|g1 u|g560|gene|gf\-5|g\-mo|go(\.w|od)|gr(ad|un)|haie|hcit|hd\-(m|p|t)|hei\-|hi(pt|ta)|hp( i|ip)|hs\-c|ht(c(\-| |_|a|g|p|s|t)|tp)|hu(aw|tc)|i\-(20|go|ma)|i230|iac( |\-|\/)|ibro|idea|ig01|ikom|im1k|inno|ipaq|iris|ja(t|v)a|jbro|jemu|jigs|kddi|keji|kgt( |\/)|klon|kpt |kwc\-|kyo(c|k)|le(no|xi)|lg( g|\/(k|l|u)|50|54|\-[a-w])|libw|lynx|m1\-w|m3ga|m50\/|ma(te|ui|xo)|mc(01|21|ca)|m\-cr|me(rc|ri)|mi(o8|oa|ts)|mmef|mo(01|02|bi|de|do|t(\-| |o|v)|zz)|mt(50|p1|v )|mwbp|mywa|n10[0-2]|n20[2-3]|n30(0|2)|n50(0|2|5)|n7(0(0|1)|10)|ne((c|m)\-|on|tf|wf|wg|wt)|nok(6|i)|nzph|o2im|op(ti|wv)|oran|owg1|p800|pan(a|d|t)|pdxg|pg(13|\-([1-8]|c))|phil|pire|pl(ay|uc)|pn\-2|po(ck|rt|se)|prox|psio|pt\-g|qa\-a|qc(07|12|21|32|60|\-[2-7]|i\-)|qtek|r380|r600|raks|rim9|ro(ve|zo)|s55\/|sa(ge|ma|mm|ms|ny|va)|sc(01|h\-|oo|p\-)|sdk\/|se(c(\-|0|1)|47|mc|nd|ri)|sgh\-|shar|sie(\-|m)|sk\-0|sl(45|id)|sm(al|ar|b3|it|t5)|so(ft|ny)|sp(01|h\-|v\-|v )|sy(01|mb)|t2(18|50)|t6(00|10|18)|ta(gt|lk)|tcl\-|tdg\-|tel(i|m)|tim\-|t\-mo|to(pl|sh)|ts(70|m\-|m3|m5)|tx\-9|up(\.b|g1|si)|utst|v400|v750|veri|vi(rg|te)|vk(40|5[0-3]|\-v)|vm40|voda|vulc|vx(52|53|60|61|70|80|81|83|85|98)|w3c(\-| )|webc|whit|wi(g |nc|nw)|wmlb|wonu|x700|yas\-|your|zeto|zte\-/i.test(a.substr(0, 4));
                    })(navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera);
                }
                var isTablet = function () {
            		return( function ( agent ) {
            			return /(?:ipad|tab)/i.test( agent );
            		} )( navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera );
            	}
				var miniTV = Object();
				miniTV.ajax = function(url,callback){
					$.get( url, function( data ) {
						callback( data );
					}); 
				};
				miniTV.hideMiniTvAndLabel = function(){
				    $('.livetv_box_label').hide();
                    $('.livetv_box').hide();
				};
				miniTV.isOn = function(){
				    if(isMobileDevice() || isTablet() || window.frmapp) {
				        return;
				    }
				    
				    
				    var url='https://toibnews.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/TOIBNews/home_topcontent_banner.htm';
				    if(window.location.host.match(/toidev|jcmsdev/)){
				        url='/home_topcontent_banner.cms?pagetype=isEnabled';
				    }
				    
				
				    
					miniTV.ajax(url,function(data){
						data = $.trim(data);
						var geoinfo = window.geoinfo;
            	        var countryCode = ( geoinfo.CountryCode || "" ).toUpperCase();
            	        var specialId_forGeoEvent =  ( $("#specialId_forGeoEvent").val() || "" ).toUpperCase();
            	        var matchId = $("#matchId").val() || "";
            	        if(
            	            specialId_forGeoEvent
            	            && countryCode != specialId_forGeoEvent
            	        ){
            	            miniTV.hideMiniTvAndLabel();
                            return;
            	        }else if( countryCode == 'HK' ){
            	            miniTV.hideMiniTvAndLabel();
            	            return;
            	        }
            	        
						if(toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') && data!=''){
	                        
							$('#minitv').html(data);
							
							if($('#streaming_box').is(":visible") && $('.livetv_box_label').is(":visible") || $('.livetv_box').is(":visible"))
	                        {
	                            $('.livetv_box_label').hide();
	                            $('.livetv_box').hide();
	                       }
	                       
						    if (typeof miniTV.clickLoad == "function") miniTV.clickLoad();
						} else if (data!=''){
						
							$('#minitv').html(data);
							
						    if($('#streaming_box').is(":visible") && $('.livetv_box_label').is(":visible") || $('.livetv_box').is(":visible"))
	                        {
	                            $('.livetv_box_label').hide();
	                            $('.livetv_box').hide();
	                       }
						}
						
						    
        				   if(miniTVType == "sponsoredvideo" && (miniTVScope == "etimes" && ((window.parent.toiprops.subsec1!=undefined && entertainmentSections.indexOf(window.parent.toiprops.subsec1) >=0) || (window.parent.channelname != undefined && window.parent.channelname == 233446897))) && countryCode=="IN")
        				   {
        				         if(toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') == undefined || (toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') && toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') != 1))
        				        {
        				        	$(".liveS_container").hide();
        				            if (typeof miniTV.clickLoad == "function") miniTV.clickLoad();
        				        }
        				        $("#player").attr("src", "/sponsortv.cms");
        				        $(".livetv_title").html(sponsoredTitle);
        				        $(".livetv_title").attr("title",sponsoredTitleFull);
        				        $("#streaming_box").addClass("sponsoredad");
        				        isSponsorVideoPlaying = true;
        				        registerSponsorVid && registerSponsorVid();
        				        
        				   }
        				   else if(miniTVType == "sponsoredvideo" && miniTVScope == "" && countryCode=="IN")
        				   {
        				        if(toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') == undefined || (toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') && toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') != 1))
        				        {
        				        	$(".liveS_container").hide();
        				            if (typeof miniTV.clickLoad == "function") miniTV.clickLoad();
        				        }
        				         $("#player").attr("src", "/sponsortv.cms");
        				         $(".livetv_title").html(sponsoredTitle);
        				         $(".livetv_title").attr("title",sponsoredTitleFull);
        				         $("#streaming_box").addClass("sponsoredad");
        				         isSponsorVideoPlaying = true;
        				         registerSponsorVid && registerSponsorVid();
        				   }
        				   else
        				   {
        				        $("#streaming_box").removeClass("sponsoredad");
        				        isSponsorVideoPlaying = false;
        				        // do nothing
        				        if(miniTVTitle == "")
        				        {
        				        
        				            if(toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') == undefined || (toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') && toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') != 1))
            				        {
            				        	$(".liveS_container").hide();
            				        }
        				        }
        				       
        				   }
					});
				};
			
			$(window).load(function(){miniTV.isOn();});
        </script>

        <section class="title_section clearfix">
         <h1 class="heading1" data-articletitle="" data-keywords="India, India news, India news today, Today news, Google news, Breaking news, West Champaran district,Raxaul,Nitin gadkari,National Highway 81 (India),motihari,Hajipur,Bihar,Bagaha" style="">
          <arttitle>
           Nitin Gadkari to inaugurate, lay stones for national highways, waterways projects worth Rs 3,381 crore in Bihar
          </arttitle>
         </h1>
         <meta content="Nitin Gadkari to inaugurate, lay stones for national highways, waterways projects worth Rs 3,381 crore i" itemprop="headline"/>
         <div class="brandwire_txt">
         </div>
         <span itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/Person">
          <a class="auth_detail" href="/toireporter/author-Madan-Kumar-479227666.cms" rel="author" target="_blank">
           Madan Kumar
          </a>

           </span>

           <meta content="2019-02-09T21:13:11+05:30"/>

        <div data-adsslot="TOI/TOI_India/TOI_ROS_TOP_IND_AS_660" data-size="[660,90]" id="div-gpt-ad-1994947675375-0-67918463" style="margin-bottom:10px;">
        </div>
        <div class="article_content clearfix">
         <arttextxml>
          <div class="section1">
           <div class="Normal">
            PATNA: Union minister,
            <a class="key_underline" href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/topic/nitin-gadkari">
             Nitin Gadkari
            </a>
            will inaugurate and lay foundation stones for national highways and waterways projects worth Rs 3,381 crore in
            <a class="key_underline" href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/topic/bihar">
             Bihar
            </a>
            on February 11 (Monday).
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Gadkari will inaugurate and lay the foundation for projects worth Rs 366.62 crore, at
            <a class="key_underline" href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/topic/Bagaha">
             Bagaha
            </a>
            in West Champaran. He will inaugurate the two-lane, strengthened 24 km long Misrauli-Parsauni section of NH 28-B. He will also lay the foundation for a road over-bridge (ROB) approach roads on NH 28-B at Bagaha and Mangalpur worth Rs 62.48 crore and Rs 68.49 crore, respectively.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            He will also lay the foundation for widening of 37 km long Manuwapul to Yogpatti-Nawalpur-Ratwal chowk road worth Rs 128.90 crore.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Another important foundation stone at Bagaha will be for the development of national waterway -37 (River Gandak) from its confluence with river Ganga at
            <a class="key_underline" href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/topic/Hajipur">
             Hajipur
            </a>
            to Triveni ghat (Bhaisalotan Barrrage, Valmikinagar). This 300 km stretch of river Gandak will be developed at a cost of Rs 12.91 crore.
            <div class="last8brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            <div class="last7brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            River conservancy measures and fairway development works are in progress. Floating terminal is being built at Kailashnagar near Bagaha. Additional floating pontoon facility is proposed at Dumaria ghat. Phase -1 of the project is scheduled to be completed by 2020, according to a press release of Gadkari's ministry.
            <div class="last6brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            <div class="last5brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            "With completion of NW-37, it will be possible to move vessels up to 1,000 ton capacity on river Gandak. There is a potential to move 11.60 million tonnes agricultural produce, construction material and other cargo over Ganga and Gandak in next 5 years. Operation of Ro-Ro services will save travel time. This will also open-up river connectivity with Nepal and give a boost to tourism and pilgrimage in these areas," the press note said.
            <div class="last4brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            <div class="last3brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            Gadkari will also visit
            <a class="key_underline" href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/topic/Motihari">
             Motihari
            </a>
            in East Champaran district where he will lay the foundation for projects worth Rs 2,540 crore. These include widening of the 83.24 km Siwan-Mashrakh-Rajapatti-Kesariya- Chakiya section of Ram Janaki Marg (NH 227-A) at a cost of Rs 1,285 crore; converting the 81.11 km Manikpur-Sahebganj-Kesariya-Areraj section of NH -74 into a four-lane road at a cost of Rs 1,254 crore and reconstruction of Mahatma Gandhi's statue and three gantry gates on NH 28 and 28A in East Champaran district at a cost of Rs 93.91 lakh.
            <div class="last2brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            <div class="last1brdiv">
            </div>
            <br/>
            In another event in
            <a class="key_underline" href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/topic/Raxaul">
             Raxaul
            </a>
            in East Champaran, Gadkari will inaugurate/ lay foundation for projects worth Rs 505 crore. He will inaugurate the widening of 40 km Chapwa to Misrauli section of NH 28-B at a cost of Rs 171.40 crore. He will lay the foundation for widening of the 69 km ICP link road and Piprakothi-Motihari-Raxaul section of NH 28 A at a cost of Rs 333.60 crore.
            <br/>
           </div>
          </div>
         </arttextxml>
         <div style="clear:both; margin-top: 15px">

  <script type="text/javascript">
   var budget_2019_banner = '';
				    
				    function getQueryParams(qs) {
    			        qs = qs.split('+').join(' ');
    			        var params = {},
    			            tokens,
    			            re = /[?&]?([^=]+)=([^&]*)/g;
    			        while (tokens = re.exec(qs)) {
    			            params[decodeURIComponent(tokens[1])] = decodeURIComponent(tokens[2]);
    			        }
    			        return params;
			        }
			        var query = getQueryParams(document.location.search);
			        var utmNewsletter = (function () {

					{if ((document.domain.indexOf(hdomain)) != -1)
					{document.domain = hdomain}}						
					var intv,intv2;var fo;
					
					/* ========== Article redirection to actual URL ============ */
					
					_cookie = {
					get : function (name) {
						var start = document.cookie.indexOf(name + "=");
						var len = start + name.length + 1;
						if (!start && name != document.cookie.substring(0, name.length))
							return null;

						if (start == -1)
							return null;
						var end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", len);
						if (end == -1)
							end = document.cookie.length;
						return unescape(document.cookie.substring(len, end));
					},

					set : function (name, value, expires, path, domain, secure) {
						var today = new Date();
						today.setTime(today.getTime());
						if (expires) {
							expires = expires * 1000; // in seconds (for days : * 60 * 60 * 24)

						}
						var expires_date = new Date(today.getTime() + (expires));
						document.cookie = name + '=' + escape(value) + ((expires) ? ';expires=' + expires_date.toGMTString() : '') + //expires.toGMTString()

								((path) ? ';path=' + path : '') + ((domain) ? ';domain=' + domain : '') + ((secure) ? ';secure' : '');
						}
					};
					var canonicalUrl = "",
						links = document.getElementsByTagName("link");
					// Getting the Canonical URL from the link attribute itself
					for (var i = 0; i < links.length; i++) {
						if (links[i].getAttribute("rel") == "canonical") {
							canonicalUrl = links[i].getAttribute("href");
							break;
						}
					}
					
					canonicalUrl = canonicalUrl.substr(canonicalUrl.indexOf(':') + 1);
					multipublishURL = multipublishURL.substr(multipublishURL.indexOf(':') + 1);
					
					if (!_cookie.get("article_" + artId) && canonicalUrl.indexOf("//economictimes.indiatimes.com") >= 0 && (canonicalUrl + location.search).split(".com")[1] != location.pathname && location.host == "economictimes.indiatimes.com" && !multipublish && !utmNewsletter) {
						_cookie.set("article_" + artId, "1", 180, "/");
						document.location.href = canonicalUrl + location.search;
					} else if (!_cookie.get("article_" + artId) && multipublishURL.indexOf("//economictimes.indiatimes.com") >= 0  && (multipublishURL + location.search).split(".com")[1] != location.pathname && location.host == "economictimes.indiatimes.com" && multipublish && !utmNewsletter) {
						_cookie.set("article_" + artId, "1", 180, "/");
						document.location.href = multipublishURL + location.search;
					}
				
					
					/* ========== Ends Article redirection to actual URL ============ */

                        'js_articleshowsp_slider_v': 8,

         <a href="/news/politics-and-nation/how-negotiation-bids-failed-in-ayodhya-case/articleshow/68178961.cms">
          How negotiation bids failed in Ayodhya case
         </a>

         </a>
        </li>
       </ul>

d},encodeUrlSafe:function(t){return A.encode(t).replace(/\+/g,"-").replace(/\//g,"_").replace(/\=/g,"~")},decode:function(t){var e,r,n,o,a,c,i,d="",h=0;for(t=t.replace(/[^A-Za-z0-9\+\/\=]/g,"");h<t.length;)o=this._keyStr.indexOf(t.charAt(h++)),a=this._keyStr.indexOf(t.charAt(h++)),c=this._keyStr.indexOf(t.charAt(h++)),i=this._keyStr.indexOf(t.charAt(h++)),e=o<<2|a>>4,r=(15&a)<<4|c>>2,n=(3&c)<<6|i,d+=String.fromCharCode(e),64!=c&&(d+=String.fromCharCode(r)),64!=i&&(d+=String.fromCharCode(n));return d=A._utf8_decode(d)},decodeUrlSafe:function(t){return A.decode(t.replace(/\-/g,"+").replace(/\_/g,"/").replace(/\~/g,"="))},_utf8_encode:function(t){t=t.replace(/\r\n/g,"\n");for(var e="",r=0;r<t.length;r++){var n=t.charCodeAt(r);128>n?e+=String.fromCharCode(n):n>127&&2048>n?(e+=String.fromCharCode(n>>6|192),e+=String.fromCharCode(63&n|128)):(e+=String.fromCharCode(n>>12|224),e+=String.fromCharCode(n>>6&63|128),e+=String.fromCharCode(63&n|128))}return e},_utf8_decode:function(t){for(var e="",r=0,n=c1=c2=0;r<t.length;)n=t.charCodeAt(r),128>n?(e+=String.fromCharCode(n),r++):n>191&&224>n?(c2=t.charCodeAt(r+1),e+=String.fromCharCode((31&n)<<6|63&c2),r+=2):(c2=t.charCodeAt(r+1),c3=t.charCodeAt(r+2),e+=String.fromCharCode((15&n)<<12|(63&c2)<<6|63&c3),r+=3);return e}},y=function(){function t(t,e){var r=t.length/2;return 0==e?t.substring(0,r):t.substring(r,t.length)}function e(t){for(var e=[],r=0,n=t.length;n>=r;r++)e.push(t.charAt(n-r));return e.join("")}function r(r){var n=e(t(r,0))+t(r,1),a=o(n,"321","e")+d;return A.encodeUrlSafe(a)}function n(r){var n=A.decodeUrlSafe(r).replace(d,""),a=o(n,"321","d");return e(t(a,0))+t(a,1)}var o=function(t,e,r){for(var n="",o=0,a=t,c=0;c<a.length;c++){var i=e[o],d="";o<e.length-1?o++:o=0,d="d"==r?parseInt(a[c].charCodeAt(0))-parseInt(i):parseInt(a[c].charCodeAt(0))+parseInt(i),n+=String.fromCharCode(d)}return n},e=function(t){for(var e=[],r=0,n=t.length;n>=r;r++)e.push(t.charAt(n-r));return e.join("")};return{encode:r,decode:n}};return t(),{isq:g,ajxc:m,ob:!1,ck:(new y).decode}};return{getInstance:function(){return t||(t=e()),t}}}();
      </script>
      <script>
       try{axs("//economictimes.indiatimes.com/acms/jsAds/getContent?admid=-1644002019&iggx=138047297&lVbk=1231221238&ad_channel=-1461018019")}catch(e){}
      </script>

        <article data-articleid="68042793" data-artidate="Feb 18, 2019, 10.14 AM IST" data-ibeat_author="Sanjay Singh" data-ibeat_channel="ET Bureau" data-ibeat_tag="Kishanganj,Lok Janshakti Party,Shatrughan Sinha,Lalu Prasad Yadav,JDU,Maharajganj district,Veena Devi">
         <input id="article_title" type="hidden" value="JDU eyes 17 seats dominated by MBCs, upper castes"/>
         <input id="article_syn" type="hidden" value="As per the agreement reached between the BJP and JDU, both of NDA’s allies will contest 17 seats each in Bihar."/>
         <input id="article_seo" type="hidden" value="news/politics-and-nation/jdu-eyes-17-seats-dominated-by-mbcs-upper-castes"/>
         <h1 class="clearfix title">
          JDU eyes 17 seats dominated by MBCs, upper castes
         </h1>
         <h2 class="title2">
          As per the agreement reached between the BJP and JDU, both of NDA’s allies will contest 17 seats each in Bihar.
         </h2>
         <div class="clearfix publish_info">
          <div class="publisher flt">
           <div class="author">
            By
            <div class="split">
             <div class="a_d">
              <span>
               <a class="italic" data-agency="" data-auname="Sanjay Singh-6926" data-seo="Sanjay Singh" href="/etreporter/author-Sanjay Singh-6926.cms" rel="author" target="_blank">
                Sanjay Singh
               </a>
              </span>
              <div class="author_box">
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           , ET Bureau
           <span class="msides5">
            |
           </span>
          </div>
          <div class="publish_on flt">
           Feb 18, 2019, 10.14 AM IST
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="clearfix sharingBox shareVert" data-share_msid="68042793">
          <a class="fb shareSprite" data-share-title="JDU eyes 17 seats dominated by MBCs, upper castes" data-share-url="http://www.ecoti.in/SKhw1Y" data-src="http://www.ecoti.in/SKhw1Y" href="javascript://" onclick='ga("send", {hitType: "social", socialNetwork: "Facebook", socialAction: "Share", socialTarget: "https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/politics-and-nation/jdu-eyes-17-seats-dominated-by-mbcs-upper-castes/articleshow/68042793.cms", page: "/news/politics-and-nation/jdu-eyes-17-seats-dominated-by-mbcs-upper-castes/articleshow/68042793.cms"})' rel="nofollow">
          </a>
          <a class="twt shareSprite" data-share-title="JDU eyes 17 seats dominated by MBCs, upper castes" data-share-url="http://www.ecoti.in/5rTCjb" data-src="http://www.ecoti.in/5rTCjb" href="javascript://" onclick='ga("send", {hitType: "social", socialNetwork: "Twitter", socialAction: "Tweet", socialTarget: "https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/politics-and-nation/jdu-eyes-17-seats-dominated-by-mbcs-upper-castes/articleshow/68042793.cms", page: "/news/politics-and-nation/jdu-eyes-17-seats-dominated-by-mbcs-upper-castes/articleshow/68042793.cms"})' rel="nofollow">
          </a>
          <a class="in shareSprite" data-share-title="JDU eyes 17 seats dominated by MBCs, upper castes" data-share-url="http://www.ecoti.in/HZROBZ" data-src="http://www.ecoti.in/HZROBZ" href="javascript://" onclick='ga("send", {hitType: "social", socialNetwork: "LinkedIn", socialAction: "Share", socialTarget: "https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/politics-and-nation/jdu-eyes-17-seats-dominated-by-mbcs-upper-castes/articleshow/68042793.cms", page: "/news/politics-and-nation/jdu-eyes-17-seats-dominated-by-mbcs-upper-castes/articleshow/68042793.cms"})' rel="nofollow">
          </a>
          <a class="wa shareSprite" data-share-title="JDU eyes 17 seats dominated by MBCs, upper castes" data-share-url="http://www.ecoti.in/y4I8nZ" data-src="http://www.ecoti.in/y4I8nZ" data-watext="Hey, This might interest you! %0A%0A" href="javascript://" onclick='ga("send", {hitType: "social", socialNetwork: "Whatsapp", socialAction: "Share", socialTarget: "https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/politics-and-nation/jdu-eyes-17-seats-dominated-by-mbcs-upper-castes/articleshow/68042793.cms", page: "/news/politics-and-nation/jdu-eyes-17-seats-dominated-by-mbcs-upper-castes/articleshow/68042793.cms"})' rel="nofollow">
          </a>
          <a class="shareSprite shareMore" href="javascript:void(0)" title="Share more">
          </a>
          <a class="shareSprite cmt-gdpr-hide cmt" data-commentbox_msid="68042793" href="javascript:void(0)" id="commentCountBtn" onclick="commentBox.show(68042793);" title="Comments">
          </a>
          <div class="flt comment_count cmt-gdpr-hide" data-msid="68042793" onclick="commentBox.show(68042793);">
           <span>
            0
           </span>
           Comments
          </div>
          <div class="flr page_options">
           <a class="asSprite fontLarge fontSize" href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="etArt.fontSizeclick(this);" title="Increase/Decrease font size">
           </a>
           <a class="asSprite print" href="/news/politics-and-nation/jdu-eyes-17-seats-dominated-by-mbcs-upper-castes/printarticle/68042793.cms" target="_blank" title="Print this article">
           </a>
           <a class="asSprite email" href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="emailSend.init();" title="Email this article">
           </a>
           <a class="bookmark-icon" data-arttype="0" data-msid="68042793" href="javascript://" title="Bookmark this article">
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="articleImg midImg">
          <figure>
           <img alt="Nitish-Kumar-PTI" border="0" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0" src="https://img.etimg.com/thumb/msid-68042791,width-300,imgsize-585641,resizemode-4/nitish-kumar-pti.jpg" vspace="0" width="300"/>
           <figcaption>
            The difficult zone is Patna which has seats like Patna Sahib and Patliputra.
           </figcaption>
          </figure>
         </div>
         <div class="artText">
          <div class="section1">
           <div class="Normal">
            The
            <a href="/topic/JDU" target="_blank">
             JDU
            </a>
            has begun the exercise of identifying seats which it may get as its share within the NDA in Bihar.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            As per the agreement reached between the BJP and JDU, both of NDA’s allies will contest 17 seats each in Bihar. Union minister Ram Vilas Paswan-headed LJP, another ally of NDA in Bihar, has got six seats as its share.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Sources in the JDU said the party leadership is eyeing 17 seats –– Valmiki Nagar, Maharajganj or Siwan, Sitamarhi, Darbhanga, Jhanjharpur, Supaul,
            <a href="/topic/Kishanganj" target="_blank">
             Kishanganj
            </a>
            , Madhepura, Banka, Nalanda, Jehanabad, Aurangabad, Karakat, Sasaram or Gopalganj, Munger, Patliputra or Patna Sahib and Purnia –– as its share within the NDA. The list of LS seats clearly show that JDU prefers to contest seats which has a good combination of “Ati Pichchara” (most backward castes) and upper castes.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            “Although a final decision on JDU’s seats is still to be taken, the party has almost completed its task of identifying the seats it wants as its share within the NDA,” a source in JDU told ET. According to him, the party wants to make its presence felt in all the divisions of the state.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            The 17 seats which the JDU prefers to contest in the 2019 LS polls include BJP’s sitting seats –– Valmiki Nagar, Maharajganj or Siwan, Darbhanga, Jhanjharpur, Sasaram or Gopalganj and Patliputra or Patna Sahib.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            While Darbhanga seat is represented sented by BJP rebel leader Kirti Azad, Sasaram and Gopalganj are under the reserved category. “Since JDU also wants to contest an SC seat, it may get either Sasaram or Gopalganj as its share,” a source in the JDU said.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            The difficult zone is Patna which has seats like Patna Sahib and Patliputra. Rebel BJP leader
            <a href="/topic/Shatrughan-Sinha" target="_blank">
             Shatrughan Sinha
            </a>
            represents Patna Sahib while Patliputra was won by union minister Ramkripal Yadav in 2014. “Both seats are politically important for the BJP,” a source in Bihar’s BJP unit said.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Former Congress leader Ram Jatan Sinha has recently joined the JDU. A three-time MLA, Sinha may be fielded from Jahanaband seat as the JDU nominee. Jahanabad was won by RLSP leader Arun Kumar in 2014. “Sinha is a prominent figure of Jahanabad and he enjoys support among his caste people –– the Bhumihars,” the source added.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Rajiv Ranjan alias Lallan Singh is likely to become JDU’s candidate from Munger LS seat which was won by LJP’s
            <a href="/topic/Veena-Devi" target="_blank">
             Veena Devi
            </a>
            .
            <br/>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="clr">
         </div>
         <div class="clr">
         </div>

        </p>
        <p class="rel-art-stry" data-track="AlsoRead2">
         <a data-no="2" data-track="AlsoRead2" href="/news/politics-and-nation/bihar-cm-nitish-kumar-defends-jdus-stand-on-citizenship-bill/articleshow/67625703.cms">
          Bihar CM Nitish Kumar defends JDU's stand on Citizenship Bill
         </a>
        </p>

         <a data-no="3" data-track="AlsoRead3" href="/news/politics-and-nation/prashant-kishore-may-join-jdu/articleshow/65827031.cms">
          Prashant Kishor joins JD(U)
         </a>

      <a href="/news/politics-and-nation/jdu-eyes-17-seats-dominated-by-mbcs-upper-castes/articleshow/68042793.cms" title="JDU eyes 17 seats dominated by MBCs, upper castes">

        </span>
       </div>
       <div>

    				    function hidePremiumContentBox(){
    			            if (typeof isContentPrintable!="undefined" && isContentPrintable == 1 && _tp_data.isLogged == true){
                                $('.article_block').removeClass('exclusive-print');
                            } else if (typeof isContentPrintable!="undefined" && isContentPrintable == 1 && _tp_data.isLogged == false){
            			        ga('send', 'event', 'SignIn Content', 'Content View', 'Viewed', 1);
                            }
    				    }

				    function getQueryParams(qs) {
    			        qs = qs.split('+').join(' ');
    			        var params = {},
    			            tokens,
    			            re = /[?&]?([^=]+)=([^&]*)/g;
    			        while (tokens = re.exec(qs)) {
    			            params[decodeURIComponent(tokens[1])] = decodeURIComponent(tokens[2]);
    			        }
    			        return params;
			        }

                                        })();

					/* ========== Article redirection to actual URL ============ */
					
					_cookie = {
					get : function (name) {
						var start = document.cookie.indexOf(name + "=");
						var len = start + name.length + 1;
						if (!start && name != document.cookie.substring(0, name.length))
							return null;

						if (start == -1)
							return null;
						var end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", len);
						if (end == -1)
							end = document.cookie.length;
						return unescape(document.cookie.substring(len, end));
					},

					set : function (name, value, expires, path, domain, secure) {
						var today = new Date();
						today.setTime(today.getTime());
						if (expires) {
							expires = expires * 1000; // in seconds (for days : * 60 * 60 * 24)

						}
						var expires_date = new Date(today.getTime() + (expires));
						document.cookie = name + '=' + escape(value) + ((expires) ? ';expires=' + expires_date.toGMTString() : '') + //expires.toGMTString()

								((path) ? ';path=' + path : '') + ((domain) ? ';domain=' + domain : '') + ((secure) ? ';secure' : '');
						}
					};
					var canonicalUrl = "",
						links = document.getElementsByTagName("link");
					// Getting the Canonical URL from the link attribute itself
					for (var i = 0; i < links.length; i++) {
						if (links[i].getAttribute("rel") == "canonical") {
							canonicalUrl = links[i].getAttribute("href");
							break;
						}
					}
					
					canonicalUrl = canonicalUrl.substr(canonicalUrl.indexOf(':') + 1);
					multipublishURL = multipublishURL.substr(multipublishURL.indexOf(':') + 1);
					
					if (!_cookie.get("article_" + artId) && canonicalUrl.indexOf("//economictimes.indiatimes.com") >= 0 && (canonicalUrl + location.search).split(".com")[1] != location.pathname && location.host == "economictimes.indiatimes.com" && !multipublish && !utmNewsletter) {
						_cookie.set("article_" + artId, "1", 180, "/");
						document.location.href = canonicalUrl + location.search;
					} else if (!_cookie.get("article_" + artId) && multipublishURL.indexOf("//economictimes.indiatimes.com") >= 0  && (multipublishURL + location.search).split(".com")[1] != location.pathname && location.host == "economictimes.indiatimes.com" && multipublish && !utmNewsletter) {
						_cookie.set("article_" + artId, "1", 180, "/");
						document.location.href = multipublishURL + location.search;
					}

   <div class="clearfix relative">
    <div class="article_wrap flt">
     <script type="text/javascript" xmlns:ext="http://exslt.org/common" xmlns:g="http://base.google.com/ns/1.0" xmlns:java="java" xmlns:listval="com.indiatimes.cms.utilities.CMSDateUtility" xmlns:nohtml="com.til.utils.CommonUtils" xmlns:valurl="com.times.utilities.CMSWebUtility" xmlns:xhtml="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
      var showFullWidthArticle = '1';
     </script>
     <div class="article_block" data-agency="ET Bureau" data-article_id="67890601" data-authors="Sanjay Singh" data-blacklist="shot," data-budget-keyword="0" data-keywords="quota Bill,Bihar,Munhwa Broadcasting Corporation,BJP,lok sabha,Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes" data-seokeywords="" data-server-sec="false" data-special_coverage="">
      <script type="text/javascript">
      </script>
      <script>
       function otab(t,n){var e="_blank";try{e="undefined"==typeof isq()||"undefined"!=typeof isq()&&isq()?"_top":"_blank"}catch(c){}window.open(t,e)}function trev(t,n){try{"undefined"==typeof
